mission_data.mission_description: The first contact between Terrans and the Kraliens in the Orion sector.

set_ship_text.name: Unknown
set_ship_text.desc: An unregistered vessel with the profile of a cargo ship.
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is the CST Voyager, how can we help you?

warning_popup_message.message: There is an urgent communique from TSB Orion.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.name: Receive communique
event.incoming_comms_text: TSN Artemis, be advised, an unregistered ship has appeared on long-range sensors. There have been recent reports of Pirate activity in the area. You are hereby ordered to locate and identify the ship. If friendly, order it to register with the Sector Magistrate at TSB Orion. If not, eliminate the hostile and ensure the security of this sector.

set_ship_text.name: Unknown
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This ship is unregistered in the sector. Order it to register at TSB Orion.

set_ship_text.name: Unknown
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This ship is unregistered in the sector. Order it to register at TSB Orion.

set_comms_button.text: Order CST Voyager to register with TSB Orion

event.name: Registration ordered

if_comms_button.text: Order CST Voyager to register with TSB Orion

event.incoming_comms_text: Acknowleged, TSN Artemis. Our apologies, it won't happen again.

clear_comms_button.text: Order CST Voyager to register with TSB Orion

set_ship_text.name: CST Voyager
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Enroute to TSB Orion for registration.

warning_popup_message.message: TSB Orion to TSN Artemis. A pirate light cruiser is inbound for DS4 at high speed. Make haste and destroy the cruiser!.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.name: Rading Party
event.incoming_comms_text: TSN Artemis, this is DS4. We have been boarded by a pirate raiding party. We require immeadiate assistance! Please dock as soon as possible!

event.name: Unusual Sensor Readings
event.incoming_comms_text: TSN Artemis, we have detected unusual sensor reading from sub-sector B5. Request you proceed to the area and investigate.
